Name: pd.merge()
Comments: Just like joining tables in DB, need to be careful joining methods (left/right/inner)

Name: df.groupby()
Usage: Grouping column(s) and then apply more aggregating functions
Comments: Very commonly used with agg() function

Name: df.groupby().agg()
Comments: Need to be used along with groupby() function

Name: pd.pivot_table()
Usage: Convert data frame to pivot table
Comments: May have multi-level indices and columns
